column3: Traffic;Preah Sihanouk Province:------ Traffic Police of Sihanoukville confiscated 14 Chinese-owned cars and kept them at the traffic police station after the drivers were found to have incorrect documents.------The detention of these vehicles was carried out at by traffic control and traffic law enforcement at 11 pm on 25 February 2019 on Independence Road
column4: near Independence Monument located in Village 3
column5: Sangkat No 3 Municipality / Sihanouk Ville.------The operation focused on drunk driving and driving a vehicle without a driving license.------However
column6: the alcohol tests of 32 car drivers resulted in negative readings. ------https://tvfb.news/article/18717
